structural_unit_name.en: Institute of Molecular and Cell Biology

description.en:
1.Basics of entrepreneurship. Main concepts regarding enterprises and business operation. Supply and demand, competition types, financial reports, financing, shares, dividends, budget, taxes, specific characters of high-technology companies. 
2. Composition of biotechnology companies. Company structure, departments, professions and their educational background, management, board, scientific board, leadership, specificity of high-technology (biotechnology) companies. 
3. Biotechnology in the world and in Estonia, biotechnology and state. Overview of Biotechnology companies. Biotech and pharma. Trends. Comparison of companies in EU and USA. Overview of Estonian and EU policy on biotechnology. Governmental support to young companies. 
4. From idea to company. Practical hints how to establish company. Business plan. Sources for financing. 
5. Product development, Quality systems, Project and time management.
6. Sales and Marketing. Targeting, sales process, international trade, negotiations. 
7. Intellectual property. Types, process, cost, IP management, licensing, IP in company's strategy, IP databases.
description.et:
1. Ettevõtluse alused. Ettevõtte toimimise põhimõte. Ettevõtlusliigid, nõudlus, pakkumine, turuhind, konkurentsivormid, vajaduste hierarhia, finantsaruanded, maksud, aktsia, osak, dividendid. Loengu käigus selgitatakse muuhulgas ettevõtlusega seotud mõisteid: kasum, käive, tulud, kulud, jne. Kõrgtehnoloogilise ettevõtluse omapära.
2.Biotehnoloogia ettevõtte ülesehitus. Millised osakonnad ja ametid on biotehnoloogia firmas? Juhatus. Nõukogu, Teadusnõukogu. Inimeste juhtimine ja motiveerimine. Loengute käigus selgitatakse millised on biotehnoloogia ettevõtte eripärad võrreldes teiste ettevõtetega? 
3. Bioettevõtlus maailmas ja Eestis, biotehnoloogia ja riik. Biotehnoloogia ettevõtted maailmas, bioteh ja farma. USA ja Euroopa ettevõtete võrdlus. Ülevaade Eesti biotehnoloogia ettevõtetest ning Eesti ja EU biotehnoloogia alasest "poliitikast". Riiklikud toetusmeetmed. 
4.Ideest biotehnoloogia ettevõtteni. Praktilised juhtnöörid kuidas luua ettevõte. Äriplaani koostamine. Ettevõtte rahastamise võimalused. 
5.Tootearendus. Kvaliteedisüsteemid. Projekti- ja ajajuhtimine. 
6.Turundus ja müük. Positsioneerimine. Müügiprotsess. Rahvusvaheline kaubandus. Läbirääkimised. 
7.Intellektuaalse omandi kaitse. Liigid, taotlemise protsess, maksumus, IO juhtimine, litsentseerimine, IO ettevõtte strateegias, teiste IO kui piirang ettevõtluses. IO andmebaasid ja nende kasutamine. 

Põhiõpik saadaval ülikooli raamatukogus e-raamatuna: C. Shimasaki "Biotechnology entrepreneurship"

objectives.en: Aim of the lecture is to give an overview of possibilities of entrepreneurship in biotechnology, the practical hints how to establish a company, compile business plan, find finances, protect intellectual property and find personnel. Lecturers will give also overview of the Estonian and World Biotechnology Sector.
objectives.et: Aine eesmärgiks on anda ülevaade äri võimalustest biotehnoloogia valdkonnas, sealhulgas praktilisi näpunäiteid kuidas ettevõtet alustada, äriplaani koostada, ideedele raha leida, intellektuaalset omandit kaitsta, personali leida. Muuhulgas antakse ülevaade biotehnoloogia sektorist nii Eestis kui mujal maailmas.

learning_outcomes.en: The student, who has passed the course;
1.Knows the main concepts regarding enterprises and business operation.
2.Understands connections and essence of different areas in small enterprises (Research and development, production and services, sales and marketing, personnel, financial management and leadership).
learning_outcomes.et: 2.Saab aru kõrgtehnoloogilise väikeettevõtte erinevate valdkondade (teadus- ja arendustegevus, tootmine/teenindus, turundus ja müük, personal, rahandus, arvestus, juhtimine) olemusest ja seostest.

learning_outcomes.en: 3.Have basic understanding how to prepare a business plan.
5.Have an overview of biotechnology sector in Estonia and trends in the world.
learning_outcomes.et: 5.Omab ülevaadet Eesti biotehnoloogia sektorist ja maailma biotehnoloogia trendidest.

learning_outcomes.en: 6.Have basic knowledge how to establish company and have an overview of supporting institutions.
learning_outcomes.et: 6.Omab baasteadmisi ettevõtte loomisest ning ülevaadet tugiorganisatsioonidest.

learning_outcomes.en: 7.Knows the intellectual property protection possibilities and the process, enables to evaluate the role of IP in the enterprise and is able to make simple patent searches
learning_outcomes.et: 7.Tunneb intellektuaalse omandi kaitse võimalusi ja kaitsmise protsessi, oskab hinnata intellektuaalse omandi rolli ettevõttes, oskab teostada lihtsamaid patendiuuringuid

notes.et: Main electronic communication channel of the course is Moodle.

independent_work.et:
1. Individual short paper on trends or a specific topic in biotechnology. Detailed instructions will be provided in the first class.
2. Group assignment (3-5 pers.): development and presentation of a business idea. Detailed instructions will be provided in class.

description.et: Groupwork (3-5) persons) written work and presentation (40% of final grade)
Individual written constructive peer feedback to one other groupwork (20% of final grade)
Individual written test (40% of final grade)

grade_preconditions.et: Short individual presentation about a chosen trend in biotechnology in class during the semester (also submitted in Moodle).

grade_evaluation.et:
Final grades according to the sum of the test and homeworks are as follows:
100 points is maximum: 100-51 points "passed", 50-0 points  "not passed"

debt_elimination.et: January 15th, 2025 at 10.15 in Riia 23b-218, or upon agreement with the teacher.

resources.mandatory_materials:
E-book available at UT library www.utlib.ee: C. Shimasaki "Biotechnology entrepreneurship. Starting, Managing, and Leading Biotech Companies"
Articles, separate chapters and slides provided by instructors (will be uploaded in SIS or Moodle).
resources.recommended_materials:
1. Craig D. Shimasaki, The Business of Bioscience. What Goes into Making a Biotechnology Product. 2009, Springer
2. Shreefal S. Mehta, Commercializing Successful Biomedical Technologies. Basic Principles of the Development of Drugs, Diagnostics and Devices. 2008 Cambridge University Press
3. Yali Friedman, Building Biotechnology. Business. Regulations. Patents. Law. Politics. Science.2008, Logos Press
4. Bill Aulet. Disciplined entrepreneurship.
5. Steve Blank and Bob Dorf. The start-up owners manual.
6. Steve Blank. Holding the cat by the tail. Lessons from an entrepreneurial life. K&S Ranch Publishers 2014.
Various books on entrepreneurship, innovation, starting a company etc., available at our library and online.

name.en: Chair of International Business and Innovation
